trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker.DateValidationError?displayProperty=fullName> event occurs when <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker.Text%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is set to a value that cannot be interpreted as a date or when the date cannot be selected.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker.DateValidationError?displayProperty=fullName>事件发生时<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker.Text%2A?displayProperty=fullName>设置为一个值，无法解释为日期或日期不能选择何时。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker.Text%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker.DateValidationError?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You can subscribe to this event and specify whether an exception is raised by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePickerDateValidationErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 你可以订阅此事件，并指定是否设置引发异常<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePickerDateValidationErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePickerDateValidationErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePickerDateValidationErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is `true`, one of the following exceptions is raised: |Exception type|Condition| |--------------------|---------------| |<xref:System.FormatException>|The text entered cannot be parsed to a valid date, and the exception is not suppressed.| |<xref:System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException>|The text entered parses to a date that is not selectable.| If <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePickerDateValidationErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is `false`, the application continues execution as usual.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePickerDateValidationErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName>`true`，将引发以下异常之一: |异常类型 |条件 | |--------------------|---------------| |<xref:System.FormatException>|输入的文本无法分析为有效日期，并不取消异常。 | |<xref:System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException>|输入的文本分析到不是可选择的日期。 | 如果<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePickerDateValidationErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName>是`false`，应用程序将像往常一样继续执行。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePickerDateValidationErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException> </xref:System.FormatException> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePickerDateValidationErrorEventArgs.ThrowException%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DatePickerDateValidationErrorEventArgs"></xref> class.
The initial exception from the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker.DateValidationError"></xref> event.
The text that caused the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker.DateValidationError"></xref> event.
Gets the initial exception associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker.DateValidationError"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 获取与关联的初始异常<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker.DateValidationError"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: The exception associated with the validation failure.
trans-unit.target: 与验证失败关联的异常。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text that caused the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker.DateValidationError"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置引发的文本<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DatePicker.DateValidationError"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: The text that caused the validation failure.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePickerDateValidationErrorEventArgs.Exception*> should be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePickerDateValidationErrorEventArgs.Exception*>应引发。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DatePickerDateValidationErrorEventArgs.Exception*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the exception should be thrown; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果应引发异常;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。
